task.voice: 您肯定也知道，现在的人口老龄化和劳动力成本都在上升，我们蓝星对于自动化和机器人技术的需求在日益增长呢！ 很希望在将来人形机器人产业开始发展的一天， 我们能成为美地新的增长点，为大家带来丰厚的投资回报呢！
task.voice_en: You must be aware that the aging population and rising labor costs are a reality, and our Blue Star is increasingly in need of automation and robotics technology! We really hope that when the humanoid robot industry takes off in the future, we can become a new growth point for Midea and bring you substantial investment returns!"
